game.name: Phenomena Embattled
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: From the far reaching void of space. To the very cores of planets. This is where Phenomena Embattled takes place. Pilot your alien trans-medium craft through aerial battles, underground caverns and deep sea trenches.
game.shortDescriptionEn: From the far reaching void of space. To the very cores of planets. This is where Phenomena Embattled takes place. Pilot your alien trans-medium craft through aerial battles, underground caverns and deep sea trenches.
